name: Anthony Fryer
title: Engineering Leader, Director, & Manager
about: Experienced Software Engineering Leader with over a decade of proven success in enhancing team performance through a dedicated commitment to team development, accountability, Agile methodologies, continuous improvement, and project management. My expertise extends to hands-on engineering, ensuring a well-rounded approach to software development. I have a track record of building and nurturing productive cross-functional relationships within and beyond the organization. I am actively seeking an opportunity to be a catalyst for positive change in people, processes, and products, while collaborating with a talented team and making meaningful contributions to a mission-driven organization.
motto: I am a developer of people, not just products.
